name: Ritz Backpackers
description:
Ritz Backpackers is finally re-opening with a face lift including all new bunk beds with privacy curtains, charger points, bed light and fan! As well as well kept Double and Twin Rooms for those who want extra privacy!

Plus, you get free wifi, a large communal kitchen, common area with pool table and a communal outdoor terrace. Guests also receive discounts on our awesome new Sports bar and grill called Harvey’s located just downstairs.

Located in the heart of St Kilda, we are surrounded by plenty of great café’s, restaurants and nightlife. And with the convenience of a tram stop right out the front which can get you to St Kilda beach in 5 mins or into the CBD within 20 mins.

Ritz Backpackers is your perfect stay while you are in Melbourne.

houseRules.notes:
The price includes the use of all bed linen, free WiFi and use of our kitchen facilities, and common areas.

Please note we are a hostel for international backpackers only you must have a valid international passport for check in.

For bookings prior to arrival we accept only Visa and MasterCard.

You must be at least 18 years old to stay at Ritz Backpackers, we do not allow children.

Ritz Backpackers is unable to guarantee all members of group bookings will be accommodated in the same room.
We offer discounted rates for guests who book directly 7 days or more, these are non-refundable if you depart early.
Once the balance is paid and the reservation is checked in, all payments are non-refundable.
When you create a booking with us, the first night's accommodation will be charged and held as a deposit to secure your reservation. If the reservation is cancelled within the free cancellation period, this will be refunded back to you.

Reception is open from 08:00 until 16:00

If you need any additional information, please don't hesitate to contact us at any time.

We look forward to seeing you soon.

House rules:
1. No alcohol or drugs in the hostel. 
2. Smoking is allowed in designated smoking areas ONLY. No smoking indoors, if the fire alarm is activated by smoking, vaping or candles etc you will be evicted immediately with no refund.
3. Our facilities are for our guests with an active reservation only. Please visit your friends outside the hostel.
4. Your belongings are your responsibility. Keep your eyes on your things – we take no responsibility for lost or stolen items.
5. Let us know if you plan to stay longer than your reservation. If you don’t book ahead your bed may be sold to someone else.
6. If you are caught stealing someone else’s food or drink you will be immediately evicted.
7. We have the right to evict anyone for unlawful, inappropriate or violent behaviour. If you refuse to leave when asked, you are trespassing and we will call the police.
8. Management reserves the right to refuse entry. These rules need to be respected by every guest at Ritz Backpackers. We want everyone to feel safe and welcome! Please don’t hesitate to ask us for help or advice.
These rules need to be respected by every guest at Ritz Backpackers. 

We want everyone to feel safe and welcome!
Please don’t hesitate to ask us for help or advice.
